short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to track worklogs in Jira

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Log Time in JIRA with EasyTime!

Boost productivity and simplify time tracking with EasyTime—a Chrome extension that enhances your JIRA experience by making it easier than ever to log, edit, and manage work hours across multiple tasks.

With EasyTime you can:

Bulk Log Time: Add work hours to multiple tasks in one step, saving time and reducing repetitive tasks.
Real-Time Insights: Get a summary of hours logged today and see what’s needed to meet your daily goals.
Manage Worklogs: Edit or delete existing worklogs directly from the extension for fast updates.

Perfect for teams and solo users looking to optimize their time tracking, EasyTime keeps your work hours organized and at your fingertips. No more switching between tabs or wondering how much time you’ve logged—just focus on your tasks and let EasyTime handle the details.

Boost Your Efficiency in JIRA Today! Try EasyTime for JIRA and Take Control of Your Time!
